article_title: Chatelain: Job No. 1 for Mike Riley? Fix quarterback play
article_text:

og.description: The absolute simplest way to jumpstart a stalled football program is to give it a bump at quarterback. Get the right guy and it’s worth three, four wins a year. Or it’s worth a championship. Sometimes both.
